subject: Validation Result: Admin Interface Design Spec (p3-2-b)

findings.notes: Exceptional design specification that exceeds expectations. Comprehensive analysis of MELO V2 vs Discord reference, detailed component patterns, complete mobile responsive specifications, and clear prioritization of next steps. Critical gap (server overview form) properly identified as HIGH priority.

content.summary: Task p3-2-b validated successfully. Comprehensive 25.8KB admin interface design specification with clear implementation roadmap. Ready for development team with identified HIGH priority next step (server overview form).
